name: 🔮 Crystal Sphinx 🔮
description:
First of all, thank you for your support and I hope you enjoy playing this as much as I enjoyed making it. 

🔮 What is Crystal Sphinx? 🔮

A conversational encounter with a celestial sphinx containing;

- 3 Riddles

- 3 Encounters

- 2 NPCS/Troika! Backgrounds

- 1 Planet Sized Death Marble!

🔮 Someone on twitter asked 🔮 What element of Crystal Sphinx are you most excited to show off? 

I'm hoping to demonstrate a more conversational way to inform a DM about vibe and direction. Using minimal text, some dialogue, colour and graphical elements to give enough direction to inform and inspire but not overwhelm.

You should be able run this on a 5 minute read through.

No prep, no page numbers, Just good old fashioned "seat of your pants" nonsensical DM'ing. 

I hope Crystal Sphinx achieves this. 

🔮 Public Service Announcement 🔮

You can do it.

You can.
